tests.name: GUI: Valid arguments
tests.description: Testing with valid port and hostname

tests.name: GUI: Valid arguments with localhost
tests.description: Testing with valid port and localhost

tests.name: GUI: Invalid port (negative)
tests.description: Port must be a positive integer
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - Port must be a positive integer

tests.name: GUI: Invalid port (too large)
tests.description: Port must be less than or equal to 65535
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - Port must be less than or equal to 65535

tests.name: GUI: Invalid port (non-numeric)
tests.description: Port must be a valid number
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - Port must be a valid number

tests.name: GUI: Invalid IP address format (too few segments)
tests.description: IP address must have exactly 4 segments
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - IP address must have exactly 4 segments

tests.name: GUI: Invalid IP address format (too many segments)
tests.description: IP address must have exactly 4 segments
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - IP address must have exactly 4 segments

tests.name: GUI: Invalid IP address segment (out of range)
tests.description: IP address segments must be between 0 and 255
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - IP address must contain valid numeric segments

tests.name: GUI: Invalid IP address segment (non-numeric)
tests.description: IP address must contain valid numeric segments
tests.expected_output: CONTAINS - IP address must contain valid numeric segments

tests.name: GUI: Port without value
tests.description: Port option is provided without a value

tests.name: GUI: Hostname without value
tests.description: Hostname option is provided without a value
